Responsibilities: - Training, promotional, and institutional video editing and post-production completed.
- Video optimized for various digital platforms including Facebook, YouTube, and TikTok.
- Professional editing of short-form (Reels/Shorts) and long-form videos.
- Video color correction, basic color grading, and enhancement of visual quality.
- Ensuring audio synchronization, noise reduction, and sound clarity.
- Incorporating simple motion graphics, title, subtitle, and lower-third design.
- Working in coordination with the content team and instructor.
- Ensuring regular video delivery according to specified deadlines.
- Maintaining video file management, version control, and data backup.
- Following the organization's branding guidelines and content standards.

Requirements: - Strong visual sense and attention to detail
- Good presentation and storytelling skills
- Effective problem-solving and creative thinking ability
- Ability to understand training content and translate it into engaging video format
- Good communication skills and team coordination ability
- Time management skills with the ability to meet deadlines
- Willingness to receive feedback and revise content accordingly
- Basic understanding of branding and digital content standards
- Ability to work independently with minimal supervision
- Positive attitude, professionalism, and responsibility toward work

Responsibilities: Job Description

Job Title: Junior Sales Executive
Location: Green Tiger Electric Vehicle Limited
Job Type: Full-Time

Job Summary:
Green Tiger Electric Vehicle Limited is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Junior Sales Executive to support sales growth, manage customer relationships, handle customer service activities, and ensure smooth order processing and payment coordination.

Key Responsibilities:
- Identify and acquire new customers through field visits, phone calls, and online platforms.
- Manage and follow up on online and offline leads to convert them into sales.
- Present and demonstrate product features, pricing, and benefits to customers.
- Maintain regular communication with existing customers and ensure repeat business.
- Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and service issues professionally and promptly.
- Process customer orders, prepare necessary documentation, and coordinate delivery schedules.
- Collect payments, confirm transactions, prepare invoices, and submit payment details to the accounts department.
- Maintain accurate records of customer information, sales activities, transactions, and complaints.
- Coordinate with internal departments such as production, accounts, service, and logistics for smooth operations.
- Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to support sales strategies.
- Prepare and submit daily, weekly, and monthly sales and customer service reports.
- Support promotional activities, campaigns, and product launches when required.
- Assist in after-sales service follow-up to ensure customer satisfaction and retention.

Qualifications and Skills:
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (preferred).
- Proficiency in MS Word and Excel is required.
- Proficient typing skills in both Bengali and English are required.
- Prior experience in sales or customer support is mandatory.
- Strong communication, negotiation, and customer handling skills.
- Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.
- Familiarity with CRM software and digital tools will be an advantage.

Key Attributes:
- Strong sense of responsibility and professionalism.
- Excellent customer service mindset with a positive attitude.
- Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
- Proactive, self-motivated, and target-oriented.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Good time management and multitasking ability.
- Attention to detail and commitment to quality work.
- Willingness to learn, adapt, and grow within the organization.

Salary:
Negotiable (Based on experience and qualifications)

Benefits & Compensation:
- Performance-based Incentives
- Subsidized Lunch Facility
- Monthly Mobile Bill Allowance
- Two Eid Bonuses per year
- Annual Salary Increment

Career Growth & Development:
- Clear career progression path
- Training and skill development opportunities
- Performance-based promotions

Apply with CV at: recruitment@greentiger.com.bd

Responsibilities: The Call Centre Agent is responsible for handling inbound and outbound calls, responding to customer inquiries, providing product or service information, and ensuring customer satisfaction through effective communication and problem-solving. The role requires professionalism, patience, and efficiency in managing a high volume of interactions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Handle inbound and outbound calls in a professional and courteous manner.
- Respond to customer inquiries, complaints, and requests promptly and accurately.
- Provide detailed information about products, services, or company policies.
- Maintain accurate records of customer interactions in the CRM system.
- Follow communication scripts and standard operating procedures (SOPs).
- Escalate complex issues to the supervisor or relevant department when necessary.
- Meet or exceed daily, weekly, and monthly performance targets (e.g., call volume, response time, customer satisfaction).
- Participate in training sessions to enhance product knowledge and communication skills.
- Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information responsibly.
- Contribute to a positive team environment and support colleagues as needed.

Increment: Special increments will be available based on sales performance and achieving specified sales targets. Responsibilities: 1. Ensure the security of the institution's building, assets, and personnel.
2. Control designated entry and exit points.
3. Monitor and maintain records of visitors and vehicles.
4. Provide regular patrols and inform authorities of suspicious activities.
5. Provide necessary assistance in emergency situations.
6. Adhere to the institution's security policies and guidelines appropriately.

Requirements: 1. Minimum pass in eighth/tenth grade (according to the institution's policy).
2. Priority will be given to those with previous experience in security work.
3. Must be physically fit and capable of fulfilling responsibilities.
4. Must have integrity, discipline, and a responsible attitude.
5. Must be capable of behaving politely and professionally with visitors and colleagues.
